participant_1.background:
I'm always trying to find new ways to make our home feel more like our own.
I like movies that make me feel something, whether it's happy, sad, scared, or anything in between.
I like to analyze my friends' behavior and try to understand their motivations.
I'm not sure if I'm a healthy person, but I'm trying my best to live a healthy lifestyle.
I love my parents very much and am grateful for all they have done for me.

participant_2.background:
I would love to try the local food with my friend.
i am quiet but confident.
I love to watch movies with my dad on a rainy day.
i try to limit how much i eat.
I just finished practicing my bass guitar in the lifeguard station.

content.text: Hello there!
Hey there!
What's your name?
My name is participant_2.
Nice to meet you participant_1. What kind of movies do you like to watch?
I like to watch movies that make me feel something. I like to be able to relate to the characters and feel their emotions.
I can relate to that. I like to watch movies that make me think about things in a different way.
That's a good way to put it. I like to be challenged by movies.
What are some of your favorite movies?
I have a lot of favorite movies, but some of my favorites include "The Shawshank Redemption," "The Godfather," and "The Lord of the Rings."
Those are all great movies! I love "The Shawshank Redemption" too. It's one of my favorites.
It's so well-made and has such a great story. I love it when movies can make you feel so many different emotions.
Me too. I think that's what makes a great movie.
I agree. So what do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends. I also like to read, watch movies, and go to the gym.
Sounds like you have a lot of interests. I like to spend time with my friends and family too. I also like to play the bass guitar.
That's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to play the bass guitar.
It's a lot of fun. You should try it sometime.
I might just do that. Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
You too!
